alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:26PM CST until March 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County. .Recent rainfall in the Big Muddy basin has caused rises in the river. At Murphysboro, the river is forecast to crest slightly above flood stage Sunday or Monday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to late Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 22.3 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.3 feet on 09/14/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
